response.overview: The "BABYMETAL Special Program" at NHK Studio Live was an intimate yet powerful performance that captured the essence of BABYMETAL's unique blend of heavy metal and pop. Broadcasted on NHK, the special featured Su-metal, Yuimetal, and Moametal delivering electrifying renditions of their hits in a controlled studio setting, allowing fans to experience their music in a more focused and immersive way. The program highlighted their vocal prowess, intricate choreography, and the raw energy that defines their live performances, offering a closer look at the artistry behind BABYMETAL's global phenomenon. The special also included insightful interviews, giving viewers a deeper understanding of the band's journey and evolution.
response.title: "BABYMETAL Special Program" NHK Studio Live
